Key Match Events: Eduardo Vargas put Chile in the lead with a header in the second minute.
Igor Jesus equalized for Brazil in added time before halftime with a towering header.
Luiz Henrique scored a last-minute winner for Brazil in the 89th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory lifted Brazil to fourth in the standings with 13 points.
Brazil are now two points behind Uruguay and eight from leaders Argentina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luiz Henrique slotted a curling strike from the edge of the box to rescue the five-time World Cup champions three much needed points.
